artist: Artist: School of Joseph Mallord William Turner R.A.; Artist: (attributed) George Harley
description: Sketchbook, 1834 (?) containing 31 pencil drawings and watercolors of Derbyshire and Sussex attributed to Turner, and bearing titles purported to be in his handwriting. The drawings are of landscapes and churches at various localities, including Alderwashy, Matlock, Cole Orton, Uckfield, Buxted and Budlitz.
medium: Graphite and watercolor on wove paper; bound volume
title: Sketchbook: Derbyshire and Sussex
